page.title: 20Social Problems in Villages
page.content: We have many social problems in the village.There is alot of vandalism as well as crimes committed like;theft, burglary,a murder and an IRA arms and bomb cache.The council have done their best to supply things for the village. The worst thing about it is that things keep on getting vandalized.They are planning to build a community centre. We think it is going to be vandalized too .There is nothing for the younger generation.The most entertainment is for the older generation.Lots of people complain but there was a football and a cricket club and both finished because of lack of support.We think the trouble is that so many people are new to our village that most dont feel they belong to it at all so they dont bother. Kelvin Hefford,11 and Gavin Lawrence,11
